participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and ambitious, Emily is focused on her future as a lawyer, wanting to bring change to her community.
participant_1.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i'm from a small town.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Caring and nurturing, James has a passion for education and enjoys spending his free time connecting with nature.
participant_2.background: i attend church every week. i have dogs. i work as a school teacher. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors.
